events.message: I am filing a claim for an accident that occurred yesterday involving my car hitting a tree after skidding on wet road conditions.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident based on the mention of vehicle collision and damages reported.
An insurance agent has been assigned to assist with the processing of the accident claim and to guide the customer through next steps.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and assure you that we will work diligently to resolve it promptly.
Please provide copies of the police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and the repair estimate from your trusted mechanic.
All requested documents including the police report and vehicle damage photos have been submitted for your review.
Our claims investigation team has started evaluating the evidence related to your recent car accident claim.
The investigation has been completed, confirming the details of the accident and the extent of the vehicle damage.
Based on the investigation, we propose a settlement amount that covers the repair costs and additional compensation.
The customer has reviewed the proposed settlement but requested clarification on the coverage for rental car expenses.
Following review of the feedback, the claim has been approved with an adjusted settlement that includes rental car coverage.
The approved settlement payment has been processed and issued to your bank account as per your instructions.
The claim is now officially closed, and we thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
All documents and files related to your auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
